text: Eckmühl (earlier known in English as Eggmuhl, in Bavaria officially as Eggmühl) is a village of Germany, in Bavaria, on the Große Laaber, 20 km S.E. of Regensburg. ==Further reading== * Castle, Ian. Eggmuhl 1809: Storm Over Bavaria, Oxford, Osprey Publishing, 1998, . ==Other websites== * Monument to the battle Category:Villages in Bavaria Category:Regensburg (district)
title: Eckmühl
